/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being immersed in the city's daily life. The buildings lining the street are painted in warm hues of yellow and orange, their balconies and awnings adding character to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above the street, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's vibrant energy and architectural charm.
